meanings.definition: A person who chooses or selects something.
meanings.sent1: The chousers picked the best apples at the market.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the chousers in our group, always making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The chousers at the ice cream shop couldn't decide between chocolate or vanilla.
meanings.sent4: Among the chousers of the team, he stood out for his excellent taste.
meanings.sent5: The chousers in the jury carefully selected the winning entry.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing or selecting.
meanings.sent1: The chousers of the committee made a decision quickly.
meanings.sent2: His chousers of outfits always impress his friends.
meanings.sent3: The chousers of the movie night were the highlight of the evening.
meanings.sent4: In the chousers of colors, she always goes for the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The chousers of the menu were challenging with so many delicious options.
